data.comment: Today's referee, Drew Fischer, has blown to start the match.
San Jose awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
San Jose to take a throw-in in Salt Lake territory.
Throw-in Salt Lake.
In the minute 7, Salt Lake's Albert Rusnak gets in a shot on goal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for San Jose in their own half.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Salt Lake at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
San Jose's Cristian Espinoza misses with an attempt on goal.
Salt Lake have a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Drew Fischer signals a Salt Lake throw-in in San Jose's half.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Salt Lake.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
In the minute 14, San Jose have a dangerous throw-in.
Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to San Jose.
Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
Cristian Espinoza scores to make it 1-0 at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 21, Vako Qazaishvili instrumental with a fine assist.
Goal! Douglas Martinez levels the match at 1-1.
Corey Baird with an assist there.
In the minute 24, Goal kick for Salt Lake at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Free kick San Jose.
Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 26, Can San Jose get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Salt Lake's half?
Drew Fischer awards Salt Lake a goal kick.
Free kick Salt Lake.
In the minute 29, San Jose needs to be cautious. Salt Lake have an attacking throw-in.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aaron Herrera (Salt Lake) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 31, San Jose have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
Cristian Espinoza (San Jose) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 35, San Jose drives forward and Andy Rios gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Salt Lake.
Drew Fischer signals a throw-in for Salt Lake, close to San Jose's area.
In the minute 37, San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick San Jose.
Corey Baird (Salt Lake) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to San Jose.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
Can San Jose capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Salt Lake's half?
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to San Jose.
Guram Kashia (San Jose) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Salt Lake at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 42, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to San Jose.
San Jose are pushing forward but Nick Lima's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
In the minute 44, San Jose to take a throw-in in Salt Lake territory.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to San Jose.
San Jose's Cristian Espinoza gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Salt Lake defender.
In the minute 45, At ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Can San Jose capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alvin Jones is replacing Donny Toia for Salt Lake at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Can Salt Lake get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
San Jose have been awarded a penalty in Orlando...
In the minute 49, Magnus Eriksson nets and San Jose now lead 2-1. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Throw-in for Salt Lake close to the penalty box.
Salt Lake have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 52, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as San Jose is awarded a throw-in in their half.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
Drew Fischer signals a Salt Lake throw-in in San Jose's half.
In the minute 56, San Jose needs to be cautious. Salt Lake have an attacking throw-in.
San Jose push upfield but Drew Fischer quickly pulls them for offside.
Drew Fischer awards Salt Lake a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
Damir Kreilach for Salt Lake drives towards goal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
In the minute 60, Can Salt Lake get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
San Jose awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Orlando San Jose drive forward through Vako Qazaishvili. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 61, Goal! Vako Qazaishvili extends San Jose's lead to 3-1.
That's a fine assist from Andy Rios.
Damir Kreilach of Salt Lake smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 64, Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
Salt Lake have a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Throw-in San Jose.
San Jose to take a throw-in in Salt Lake territory.
Free kick San Jose.
In the minute 66, Justen Glad (Salt Lake) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Freddy Juarez (Salt Lake) is making a second substitution, with Kyle Beckerman replacing Everton Luiz.
Freddy Juarez is making the team's third substitution at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex with Justin Meram replacing Corey Baird.
In the minute 69, San Jose's Magnus Eriksson breaks free at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Salt Lake at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Throw-in for Salt Lake at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 75, Goal! Damir Kreilach pulls one back for Salt Lake to make it 3-2.
Great play from Marcelo Silva to set up the goal.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for San Jose in their own half.
Carlos Fierro is on a sub for Cristian Espinoza for San Jose.
Drew Fischer signals a Salt Lake throw-in in San Jose's half.
San Jose awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 79, Can Salt Lake get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
Alvin Jones (Salt Lake) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by San Jose defenders.
Salt Lake to take a throw-in in San Jose territory.
In the minute 81, Matias Jesus Almeyda is making the team's second substitution at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex with Shea Salinas replacing Tommy Thompson.
Chris Wondolowski is on a sub for Andy Rios for San Jose.
San Jose make their fourth substitution with Cade Cowell replacing Vako Qazaishvili.
In the minute 82, Salt Lake are in shooting range from this free kick.
Drew Fischer signals a Salt Lake throw-in in San Jose's half.
In Orlando Salt Lake attack through Pablo Ruiz. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 82, San Jose have a goal kick.
Ball safe as San Jose is awarded a throw-in in their half.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Marcelo Silva (Salt Lake) sees red and is sent off in Orlando!
Attention is being given to San Jose’s Jackson Yueill and play has been suspended briefly.
Jackson Yueill has recovered and rejoins the match in Orlando.
In the minute 86, San Jose take a comfortable 4-2 lead thanks to Chris Wondolowski.
Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
Salt Lake to take a throw-in in San Jose territory.
Drew Fischer signals a throw-in for Salt Lake, close to San Jose's area.
Salt Lake are coming forward and Pablo Ruiz gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Drew Fischer awards San Jose a goal kick.
Drew Fischer will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Can Salt Lake get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
An attacking San Jose player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
It's 5-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Florian Jungwirth is replacing Judson for San Jose at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Magnus Eriksson gives San Jose a 5-2 lead from the penalty spot.
